name: Kikeiriki - Chicken
description:
RPR: £35.95 / SALE PRICE: £23.95

Meet Kikeiriki a versatile chicken who always has a trick up her sleeve. Just don't call her hen!

  • 30 x 50cm
  • Machine Washable 30 °C
  • Upper fabric: plush. Filling: cotton wool (polyester)
  • Suitable for 12+

Exclusive designer toys from Germany. The BEASTS are different from your average plush toy, using only the finest materials like faux leather, fleece, felt and thick tuft - to name just a few. These exquisite materials give the BEASTS their special look!

Sigikid go to great lengths in choosing the perfect buttons, stitching and patterns to create a unique sigikid BEAST. Their “beasty” character has to come across and putting those finishing touches on a BEAST takes special skills in the production process.

BEASTS are never mass-produced, but instead are produced in small batches and hand finished. This is why BEASTS are sometimes referred to as plush sculptures rather than plush toys.

name: Gigi Gibbon
description:
RPR: £44.95 / SALE PRICE: £27.95

Gigi Gibbon is a designer monkey by sigikid with a very athletic body and exceptional shaggy fur. However, he seems a bit nervous when you are there. So, you´d better take him home and promise to be faithful to him forever.

  • 45cm
  • Dry Clean Only
  • Upper fabric: plush. Filling: cotton wool (polyester)
  • Suitable from 12+

name: Momo
description:
RPR: £14.95 / SALE PRICE: £9.50

Welcome to the weirdly wonderful world of the ‘Mutant Dolls’. As with all mutants, they develop completely unique traits...meaning no two are the same. Because each Mutant Doll is unique, the materials used will not be the same as in the featured pictures. If you have a specific colour you would like request this in your order and we will do our best to accommodate you!

Despite their scary name, the dolls are fun and only a little bit mischievious! Sometimes their colourful looks and oversized features make them difficult to understand , but really they are just searching for some love.

All come packaged with a key chain and sucker affixed to the top of the head, so they can be attached to any surface like a car window or computer screen, or to bags, anything you like!

  • 30 cm
  • Suitable for age 3+

name: Mini Pinkypunk
description:
RPR: £12.50 / SALE PRICE: £6.50

These travel sized pinkypunks are ideal pocket friends! Available in a random selection of colours and fabrics.

  • 27 cm
  • Aged 12 years+

Designed and hand made in New York by Pachy Sarmiento, Pinky Punk dolls are offered exclusively for sale in Europe by Big Softy.

Carefully selected fabrics and skilled craftwork give Pinky Punks their eye catching looks to match their dazzling personalities!

These dolls are only produced in very small quantities, using all new materials, each one handmade by their creator.

As far as we know there are no other Pinky Punks in Europe. Get your very own Pinky Punk, and be the envy of your friends. :-)

Pinky Punks are great campanions and friends - loyal and loving. With their long arms and soft cuddly cushioned bodies, they just need “Somebody to Love”

name: Krock Ant
description:
RPR: £59.95 / SALE PRICE: £48.95

Krock-Ant is a crocodile with very extraordinary fur, a scrumptious big mouth and a long body to lean on. Does it need more to attract YOU? Come on, won´t you give the signature friend the attention he deserves!

  • 75 cm
  • Dry Clean Only
  • Upper fabric: plush. Filling: cotton wool (polyester)

name: Voulez Vous
description:
RPR: £54.95 / SALE PRICE: £29.95

No doubt, this sophisticated lady cat sets the tone in every sense. Because she is such a proud and picky one, she feels that she should not wait for someone to come and pay her the attention she deserves. Right now she is choosing you! And if you are really lucky, she will charmingly smile at you and say: "Voulez-vous?"

  • 30cm

Ze Super Zeros are hero friends whose Zuper Powers and problems blend together. They have their pluses and minuses, but they’re super special!

Each Super Zero has a “mini” power and a related challenge that teach kids to embrace what makes them unique and find their inner Super Zero!

Ze Super Zeros feature removable capes/comforters and pouches to contain kids’ special treasures.

description:
